mapper.sql: ID, USER_OID, NAME, DISTRICT_OID, ORGAN_OID, TYPE, SEX, TELPHONE, MOBILE, EMAIL, SORT, BIRTHDATE, HEAD_IMAGE_ATTA_OID, IS_ABLE, IS_DELETE, CARD_NO, USER_POSITION, SKIN_CLASSNAME, ADVI_STATUS,DATA_AUTHORITY, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE,POST_OIDS, STATISTIC_TYPES
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from t_sys_user
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_user (USER_OID, NAME, DISTRICT_OID, ORGAN_OID, TYPE, SEX, TELPHONE, MOBILE, EMAIL, SORT, BIRTHDATE, HEAD_IMAGE_ATTA_OID, IS_ABLE, IS_DELETE, CARD_NO, USER_POSITION, SKIN_CLASSNAME, DATA_AUTHORITY,POST_OIDS, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, STATISTIC_TYPES) values ( #{userOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{districtOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{birthdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{headImageAttaOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isAble,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skinClassname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataAuthority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{postOids,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statisticTypes,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update t_sys_user
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
USER_OID = #{record.userOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISTRICT_OID = #{record.districtOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGAN_OID = #{record.organOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE = #{record.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEX = #{record.sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TELPHONE = #{record.telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE = #{record.mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{record.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SORT = #{record.sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BIRTHDATE = #{record.birthdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
HEAD_IMAGE_ATTA_OID = #{record.headImageAttaOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_ABLE = #{record.isAble,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_DELETE = #{record.isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CARD_NO = #{record.cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_POSITION = #{record.position,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SKIN_CLASSNAME = #{record.skinClassname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{record.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_DATE = #{record.modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ADVI_STATUS = #{record.adviStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DATA_AUTHORITY = #{record.dataAuthority,jdbcType=INTEGER},
POST_OIDS = #{record.postOids,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POST_OIDS = #{record.statisticTypes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update t_sys_user set ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, USER_OID = #{record.userOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISTRICT_OID = #{record.districtOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORGAN_OID = #{record.organOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{record.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{record.sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TELPHONE = #{record.telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE = #{record.mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{record.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SORT = #{record.sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BIRTHDATE = #{record.birthdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, HEAD_IMAGE_ATTA_OID = #{record.headImageAttaOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_ABLE = #{record.isAble,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IS_DELETE = #{record.isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CARD_NO = #{record.cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_POSITION = #{record.position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SKIN_CLASSNAME = #{record.skinClassname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{record.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_DATE = #{record.modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ADVI_STATUS = #{record.adviStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DATA_AUTHORITY = #{record.dataAuthority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, POST_OIDS = #{record.postOids,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATISTIC_TYPES = #{record.statisticTypes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update t_sys_user
USER_OID = #{userOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISTRICT_OID = #{districtOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGAN_OID = #{organOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TELPHONE = #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SORT = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BIRTHDATE = #{birthdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
HEAD_IMAGE_ATTA_OID = #{headImageAttaOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_ABLE = #{isAble,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_DELETE = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CARD_NO = #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_POSITION = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SKIN_CLASSNAME = #{skinClassname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ADVI_STATUS = #{adviStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DATA_AUTHORITY = #{dataAuthority,jdbcType=INTEGER},
POST_OIDS = #{postOids,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATISTIC_TYPES = #{statisticTypes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_sys_user set USER_OID = #{userOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISTRICT_OID = #{districtOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORGAN_OID = #{organOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TELPHONE = #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SORT = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BIRTHDATE = #{birthdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, HEAD_IMAGE_ATTA_OID = #{headImageAttaOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_ABLE = #{isAble,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IS_DELETE = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CARD_NO = #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_POSITION = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SKIN_CLASSNAME = #{skinClassname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ADVI_STATUS = #{adviStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DATA_AUTHORITY = #{dataAuthority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, POST_OIDS = #{postOids,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATISTIC_TYPES = #{statisticTypes,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT SYSUSER.ID,SYSUSER.USER_OID, SYSUSER.NAME, SYSUSER.DISTRICT_OID, SYSUSER.ORGAN_OID, SYSUSER.TYPE, SYSUSER.SEX, SYSUSER.TELPHONE, SYSUSER.MOBILE, SYSUSER.EMAIL, SYSUSER.SORT, SYSUSER.BIRTHDATE, SYSUSER.HEAD_IMAGE_ATTA_OID, SYSUSER.IS_ABLE, SYSUSER.IS_DELETE, SYSUSER.CARD_NO, SYSUSER.USER_POSITION, SYSUSER.SKIN_CLASSNAME, SYSUSER.CREATE_DATE,SYSUSER.DATA_AUTHORITY,SYSUSER.POST_OIDS, SYSUSER.MODIFY_DATE,SYSUSER.STATISTIC_TYPES FROM T_SYS_USER SYSUSER INNER JOIN T_SYS_LOGIN L ON SYSUSER.USER_OID = L.USER_OID INNER JOIN T_SYS_LOGIN_ROLE R ON L.LOGIN_OID = R.LOGIN_OID WHERE SYSUSER.IS_DELETE = 0
AND R.ROLE_OID = #{roleOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT DISTINCT SYSUSER.ID,SYSUSER.USER_OID, SYSUSER.NAME, SYSUSER.DISTRICT_OID, SYSUSER.ORGAN_OID, SYSUSER.TYPE, SYSUSER.SEX, SYSUSER.TELPHONE, SYSUSER.MOBILE, SYSUSER.EMAIL, SYSUSER.SORT, SYSUSER.BIRTHDATE, SYSUSER.HEAD_IMAGE_ATTA_OID, SYSUSER.IS_ABLE, SYSUSER.IS_DELETE, SYSUSER.CARD_NO, SYSUSER.USER_POSITION, SYSUSER.SKIN_CLASSNAME, SYSUSER.CREATE_DATE,SYSUSER.DATA_AUTHORITY,SYSUSER.POST_OIDS, SYSUSER.MODIFY_DATE,SYSUSER.STATISTIC_TYPES FROM T_SYS_USER SYSUSER INNER JOIN T_SYS_LOGIN L ON SYSUSER.USER_OID = L.USER_OID INNER JOIN T_SYS_LOGIN_ROLE R ON L.LOGIN_OID = R.LOGIN_OID WHERE SYSUSER.IS_DELETE = 0
AND SYSUSER.ORGAN_OID = #{organOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select SYSUSER.ID,SYSUSER.USER_OID, SYSUSER.NAME, SYSUSER.DISTRICT_OID, SYSUSER.ORGAN_OID, SYSUSER.TYPE, SYSUSER.SEX, SYSUSER.TELPHONE, SYSUSER.MOBILE, SYSUSER.EMAIL, SYSUSER.SORT, SYSUSER.BIRTHDATE, SYSUSER.HEAD_IMAGE_ATTA_OID, SYSUSER.IS_ABLE, SYSUSER.IS_DELETE, SYSUSER.CARD_NO, SYSUSER.USER_POSITION, SYSUSER.SKIN_CLASSNAME, SYSUSER.CREATE_DATE,SYSUSER.DATA_AUTHORITY,SYSUSER.POST_OIDS, SYSUSER.MODIFY_DATE, D.NAME AS DISTRICT_NAME , R.NAME AS ORGAN_NAME FROM T_SYS_USER SYSUSER LEFT JOIN T_SYS_DISTRICT D ON SYSUSER.DISTRICT_OID = D.DISTRICT_OID LEFT JOIN T_SYS_ORGAN R ON SYSUSER.ORGAN_OID = R.ORGAN_OID
and D.IS_ABLE=1 and D.IS_DELETE=0 and R.IS_ABLE=1 and R.IS_DELETE=0
and D.DISTRICT_OID_PATH LIKE '${loginDistrictOid}'
order by SYSUSER.${orderByClause}
SELECT SYSUSER.USER_OID, SYSUSER.NAME, SYSUSER.DISTRICT_OID, SYSUSER.ORGAN_OID FROM T_SYS_USER SYSUSER WHERE SYSUSER.IS_DELETE = 0 and SYSUSER.IS_ABLE = 1 order by ID DESC
